name: DoubleTree by Hilton Resort Zanzibar - Nungwi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Double Tree - the location is amazing! We opened our room door to a veranda five steps from the sand, and twenty steps from the ocean!
reviews.title: Hotel literally on the beach, the sea outside your patio

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Situated at the perfect spot - last hotel, thus on the right are expanses of open beach, and on the left is the busy strip with loads of beachy bungalows, other hotels, places to eat and of course, scuba and snorkelling :-)
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Evening turn downs everynight prepare your bedroom for slumber, free wifi throughout the premises, daily pool aerobics, delicious food - the list goes on.
reviews.title: a hidden gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tip: Go for a plan that includes breakfast, then venture out for lunch and dinner by taking a stroll along the beach to one of the local spots. The food is out of this world - one of the islands main economic activities are the spice trade, and it is definitely reflected in their food. Mmmm!
reviews.title: Stunning

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Another tip: Most tours, even if booked through the hotel, are run by locals - all snorkelling and scuba trips are via wooden dows - so be sure to take double doses of your nausea pills if you suffer from sea sickness. Totally worth it though, beautiful beyond words and an experience like no other.
reviews.title: Very Nice Rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Getting to Zanzibar sounded like a mission so I have put the trip off for years. I regret not going sooner! We arrived at the hotel after sunset and after a flying from Dubai via Dar es Salaam. When we got to the hotel rather than having us stand at the reception desk to check in, they suggested we take a seat on the lounge and served us an iced tea and cold towel while they did everything for us.
reviews.title: Incredible location and service! Asante Sana!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: That night we had heard of a full moon party and the reception staff were very helpful with finding it's location and arranging a taxi driver who would take us there, wait as long as we wanted while we danced the night away under a full moon on the beach and then he brought us home. He charged $40USD!! So of course we gave much more than that to say thank you.
reviews.title: Good relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The next morning we woke up to the view from our room overlooking the pool and out to the sea and it was spectacular! Cured the hangover instantly! We were in heaven!
reviews.title: Beautiful location, nice rooms, and great customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012
reviews.text: We went for breakfast and the staff there were so lovely! Selma was looking after us and we were like her best friends by the end of our first breakfast. Shah was making us omelettes and he also surprised us with special pancakes and syrup. They were both so amazing!
reviews.title: Personal all time longest waiting time for lunch of the day!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The staff at the pool bar also exceptional! So welcoming and friendly!
reviews.title: A piece of paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had an awsome time at the resort, The food an beverage manager and his staff where exceptional, their service and attention to detail was great, the food was fantastic with the emphasis on qaulity rather than qauntity. The access road to the hotel is very bad and something should be done about it and the bathrooms are dated and can do with a upgrade
reviews.title: Great holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The Doubletree provided a pleasant stay at a competitive price. The rooms were nice, but could use minor renovations. The property itself provided all the desired amenities. This could easily be a 4 star property with a few changes such as investing in a proper fitness center and improving the restaurant quality. The food and drinks met expectations but did not impress. Only other suggestion is to expand the happy hour to the pool bar. All in all, I recommend staying here if the rate is right.
reviews.title: Nice place and good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Excellent.. Exceeellennt... Exceeeeellennnttttt!!!!!
reviews.title: The perfect place to rejuvenate!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We could relax and enjoy the excellent view from our room's balcony while keeping an eye on our children. Our Children felt at home as there were no restrictions.
reviews.title: Great one!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great food and great ambience. Very friendly staff. Clean and comfortable rooms. Housekeeping ensures that your bed looks HOT and different every single day!..
reviews.title: No Soul.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at Doubletree for a little bit more than a week for Christmas 2011 and had a very good time. We had reserved a room with seaview on third floor which supposedly had´nt been used for some time. There was no problem to change for another room and for the rest of the stay it was clean and well looked after all of the time.
reviews.title: Fantastic service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel manager and his family were present at the hotel and we saw them every day, always with a smile and with a question; are there anything we can do to make our stay more comfortable?
reviews.title: perfect hotel to relax and rejuvinate

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the all-inclusive-package and it was better than we ever had before. Restuarant manager always attended lunch and dinner, making sure everyone were having a good time. We had planned to eat out, walking along the beach and to try different places for lunch, but we stayed at Doubletree for all meals but one. Bar service and staff were very serviceminded, always with a smile and a few friendly words. Both hotel beach and pool-area was great. To us, this was a great place to relax and enjoy ourselves before going back to busy work again. We are traveling quite often both in Europe, Asia and Africa and we both agree - we certainly would like to visit Doubletree again. Thank you!
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we spent 3 nights at doubletree on our honeymoon.
reviews.title: good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We totally enjoyed our stay. The room was clean and really comfortable, and we were 15 steps away from a beautiful white beach and turquoise sea.
reviews.title: Fantastic vacation!!

aka: Doubletree By Hilton Resort Zanzibar - Nungwi Hotel Nungwi
description: Unwind at DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Zanzibar-Nungwi, set on the most northern tip of Zanzibar in Tanzania. Feel valued and cared for on arrival with a freshly baked DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie. Relax in a spacious guest room with a private balcony and ocean panoramas or upgrade to a two-room suite and feel pampered with a 30-minute house massage, fully stocked mini bar, and daily fruit basket.Boasting a traditional Zanzibar style with Makuti palm leaf roofs, this Nungwi hotel offers spectacular sea views and direct beach access. Relax on pristine, white sand with sun beds and parasols and explore the tropical waters while scuba diving or snorkeling. Plunge into the outdoor, freshwater pool or sip on cocktails and fresh fruit juices from Dolphin’s pool bar. Continue your exercise routine in the modern fitness center or enjoy morning yoga on the beach.Savor innovative international and fusion specialties at Fisherman Bar & Grill before admiring the Zanzibar sunset and trying authentic Shisha aromatic tobacco. Enjoy traditional, live entertainment at Ngalawa Restaurant and savor delicious local cuisine next to the beach.Celebrate your dream wedding with stunning, exotic backdrops, host your special event on the beach, or choose from three flexible function rooms for your next corporate meeting of up to 100 guests. Stay productive in the well-equipped business center and enjoy complimentary parking and WiFi throughout the hotel.
